name: GaGa Ball
description:
Download GaGa Ball for free now!

The game presents a classical variant of the popular Match3 game.

More divine matching combinations and challenging game modes brimming with magic!

This magic puzzle adventure will instantly quench your thirst for fun. 

🎯 Goal of game is to find and match objects according to the
requirements of each level.

Conquer the worlds,  perform missions, collect  things, getting the rewards.

Start your the magnificent journey in 16+ worlds, 300+ levels!

GaGa Ball is completely free to play, but some in-game items such as extra moves or lives will require payment.

👉🏻Application does not contain advertising! 👈🏻
👉🏻No internet 👈🏻

GaGa Games Studio
making easy games
